thanks for sharing this, I gave up a while back
because I was having so many problems but soon I want
to try again. If you have any other stuff to share in
regards to Heritrix on windows now or the future it
would be great if you could share it.

--- Subramanya C R <subramanyacr@...> wrote:

> Hi members,
> 
> I came across problem running Heritrix on Windows
> XP, it was throwing
> exception in terminal "java.io.IOException: Cannot
> find subdir: conf".
> 
> I just add the command line option like below :
> "-Dheritrix.home=<heritrix_home_path>" 
> 
> It worked, I am not sure is there any other method
> to overcome this
> problem. However my friends anyone having problem
> running Heritrix on
> Windows can get help from this.
> 
> Sample .bat or .cmd file
> ----------------------
> set HERITRIX_HOME=C:/java/heritrix-1.4.0
> set
>
CLASSPATH=%HERITRIX_HOME%/heritrix-1.4.0.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%/lib/ant....
> java -Dheritrix.home=C:/java/heritrix-1.4.0 -Xmx256m
> org.archive.crawler.Heritrix
> -----------------------------
> 
> Thanks,
> Subramanya C R
> 
> 
> 
>
